name: Knights and Merchants: The Peasants Rebellion
description:
You can also download KaM Remake for higher resolution and additional features from for example here:
https://www.knightsandmerchants.net/information/kam-remake#download
It requires you to have the original game.
notes: It doesn't work with the new nvidia offloading feature. I didn't test on nvidia-only setup.

files.setup: N/A:Select the installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the installer provided by GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Knights and Merchants/KM_TPR.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
